oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Community Day video
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rare Books and Special Collections; American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This compilation video was created from scenes depicting AUC and its student, faculty, and campus in the AUC Historic Films collection. The video was created by RBSCL staff and displayed at Community Day in 2015
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: American University in Cairo -- History
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AUC Historic Films Collection; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To inquire about permissions or reproductions, contact the Rare Books and Special Collections Library, The American University in Cairo at +20.2.2615.3676 or rbscl-ref@aucegypt.edu.
